channel.title: Looking for a web designer
channel.description:
I am looking for someone to create a design for my website, I was hoping for free but I will give rslegacy.org domain for doing it or I offer to do graphics for you in return. I could possibly pay a few bucks but would prefer not have to go though the trouble of getting paypal money. I am not looking for a professional web designer but the more experianced the better. Please reply here or add my skype below,
Skype: thefatman101
If interested please post or add me with the following filled out.
[CODE]How much experiance: Payment? (domain, graphics, free, paypal): your skype: preview of some work(not needed):[/CODE]
Thanks very much in advance

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Sibor:

Hey, I’d be glad to give you one of mine and tell you how to edit it! PM me through here for more information.

You can do what you’d like, but I personally wouldn’t just give him a template, no matter how good or bad it may be. Let him figure out how to make them on his own, considering the fact he’s being so abrupt coming here and asking for help, with an attitude.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Hey, I’d be glad to give you one of mine and tell you how to edit it! PM me through here for more information.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you read the rules you’d realise no form of payments can be given, accepted or organised through moparscape. If you want to have benefits from a forum and use its services the least you could do is be considerate and read the rules. Especially when you’re constantly linked to them by the news section at the top of the forums.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @prayerhunta prayerhunta
item.description:
@prayerhunta wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:5, topic:471227”][quote author=prayerhunta link=topic=588765.msg4174046#msg4174046 date=1354750218]
If you read my thread properly you would see I am willing to pay, just mentioned that free would be very well appreciated. Maybe next time read everything before posting. thanks.
[/quote]Every post Ruby posts is very informative and helpful. Why are you so hostile towards him for him trying to assist you? You stated you were looking for designers, they are completely different from developers.[/quote]

Yes I understand that but Ruby is saying about going to a free template place, that isn’t what I want. I want a customly made one, and I said I am willing to pay yet Ruby took as I was ONLY asking for a free one, I am not acting hostile towards Ruby. I was just stating that I am willing to pay some.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:

[quote=“prayerhunta, post:3, topic:471227”]If you read my thread properly you would see I am willing to pay, just mentioned that free would be very well appreciated. Maybe next time read everything before posting. thanks.[/quote]Every post Ruby posts is very informative and helpful. Why are you so hostile towards him for him trying to assist you? You stated you were looking for designers, they are completely different from developers.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Designers and Developers are two different things just so you know.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a web designer
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

If you’re asking for something for free I don’t think you’re terribly at liberty to ask how much experience a person has in that area. Go look at a free website templates site if that’s what you’re looking for. Or look at some CSS documentation and basic HTML then you’ll be able to do it yourself.

Read full topic
